column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I was a bit hesitant with all of the hype around this place that it would be more trendy than quality
column2: but I am SO glad I was wrong.  The food here was AMAZING.  Maybe one of the best meals I have had in Chicago.  The restaurant is small and dark
column3: but still a great ambiance.  The service was outstanding; as were the cocktails.  We had the mixed green salad
column7: and brussels sprouts.  For desert we had the chocolate pie.  Everything was outstanding
column8: and was more than enough food for four people.  I highly recommend Bavette's and can't wait to go back!
